activities.name: Brush teeth
activities.help: You can get points for brushing your teeth only 2 times a day (morning from 7am to 9am and evening from 7pm to 10pm)

activities.name: Math
activities.help: Ask dad to provide you math sheets. You can earn points twice a day (from 7am to 7pm)

activities.name: Dishes
activities.help: Help parents with dishes and be rewarded by points. No limitation for this type of activity
